ygData.subject: About the Scarecrows.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard you people talking about scarecrows. What is wierd is that I met a NPC on the 3rd floor of the Erudin Library, who for 20 gold pieces will sell
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard you people talking about scarecrows.
What is wierd is that I met a NPC on the 3rd
floor of the Erudin Library, who for 20 gold
pieces will sell you a piece of parchment that
offers some script about animating a scarecrow.
This is supposed to be from an original copy
of some of Morbius's collection (I think thats
him, the ultimate necromancer we read about in
Norrath's history books). I am not sure where
this parchment was trying to lead me, since I am
not sure where this parchment was trying to lead
me, since I am still a lower leveled wizard, and
do not have much knowledge of Norrath yet. Has
anyone else gotten this piece of parchment? Does
anyone know about this quest?


I just thought anout it when someone was talking
about killing scarecrows at some garden place.

Appreciate any info.

Dason Falth
Erudite Wizard Lvl 6
